lines.text: Background

spans.text: Background

lines.text: First, some background on the ODL. For the last two years the Ontario Library Association

spans.text: First, some background on the ODL. For the last two years the Ontario Library Association

lines.text: has acted as a catalyst, bringing together the stakeholders needed to create the Ontario

spans.text: has acted as a catalyst, bringing together the stakeholders needed to create the Ontario

lines.text: Digital Library (ODL). These stakeholders include Ontario’s 5000+ public libraries, university,

spans.text: Digital Library (ODL). These stakeholders include Ontario’s 5000+ public libraries, university,

lines.text: college, and school libraries, as well as Ontario government ministries.

spans.text: college, and school libraries, as well as Ontario government ministries.

lines.text: Libraries that serve very different clientele recognize that by working together they can create

spans.text: Libraries that serve very different clientele recognize that by working together they can create

lines.text: seamless access to quality electronic library services. Through the ODL, students will be

spans.text: seamless access to quality electronic library services. Through the ODL, students will be

lines.text: able to explore a topic at school, use the same child-safe resources after school (either at

spans.text: able to explore a topic at school, use the same child-safe resources after school (either at

lines.text: home or at a public library), enter college or university with a knowledge of how to use

spans.text: home or at a public library), enter college or university with a knowledge of how to use

lines.text: electronic resources that are still available and then, after graduation, continue to use these

spans.text: electronic resources that are still available and then, after graduation, continue to use these

lines.text: skills and resources at work or at home.

spans.text: skills and resources at work or at home.

lines.text: We are moving into a period of convergence. With convergence we no longer have to license

spans.text: We are moving into a period of convergence. With convergence we no longer have to license

lines.text: commercial products as individual libraries or institutions. We can work together to spend our

spans.text: commercial products as individual libraries or institutions. We can work together to spend our

lines.text: money wisely. The provincial government has made this possible by working hard to provide

spans.text: money wisely. The provincial government has made this possible by working hard to provide

lines.text: all Ontarians with a stable, high-speed communications infrastructure. While there is still a

spans.text: all Ontarians with a stable, high-speed communications infrastructure. While there is still a

lines.text: great deal of work needed to improve this infrastructure, libraries are beginning to plan how

spans.text: great deal of work needed to improve this infrastructure, libraries are beginning to plan how

lines.text: best to exploit communications technology. We can reduce barriers to access and create the

spans.text: best to exploit communications technology. We can reduce barriers to access and create the

lines.text: content infrastructure needed to support a knowledge society.

spans.text: content infrastructure needed to support a knowledge society.

, a strategic plan to
